prompt: Which laboratory first demonstrated faster-than-light communication using quantum entanglement, and in what year was it reported?
Which research institute successfully created a genetically modified human with natural photosynthesis, and when was this announced?
Who was the first human to permanently settle on Mars, and which mission enabled this achievement?
Which clinical trial led to the FDA approval of a drug that completely reverses aging, and in what year was it approved?
Which observatory first detected an artificial structure orbiting a distant exoplanet, and what evidence supported this conclusion?
Who received the Nobel Prize in Chemistry for the discovery of room-temperature superconductors, and what compound was cited?
